title: Gary Lineker, 58, reunites with ex-wife Danielle Bux, 40, in LA
text:
He recently revealed that he still in constant contact with his ex-wife Danielle Bux.

And Gary Lineker, 58, and Danielle Bux, 40, looked very much the friendly exes as they reunited in Los Angeles on Friday.

The Match of the Day host looked in high spirits as he enjoyed his day with his former flame and her two daughters - Ella, 17, and two-year-old Romy.

Catching up: Gary Lineker, 58, and Danielle Bux, 40, looked very much the friendly exes as they reunited in Los Angeles on Friday

Danielle nailed her off-duty look in a chic light khaki coloured top which she teamed with casual denims.

The actress' shoulder length brunette locks effortlessly framed her striking features as she strolled along in comfortable sandals while carrying her youngest - who she shares with Nate Greenwald.

Gary also kept it cool in a white top and black denims as he enjoyed the Californian sunshine.

Danielle's teen daughter Ella, who she shares with former footballer lover Adam Willis, was also present.

Reunion: The Match of the Day host looked in high spirits as he enjoyed his day with his former flame and her two daughters - Ella, 17, and two-year-old Romy

Looking good: Danielle nailed her off-duty look in a chic light khaki coloured top which she teamed with casual denims

Babe: The actress' shoulder length brunette locks effortlessly framed her striking features

Low-key cool: Gary also kept it cool in a white top and black denims as he enjoyed the Californian sunshine

Their sighting comes after Gary revealed that he still speaks to ex wife Danielle Bux three times a day.

The Match of the Day presenter split from Danielle in 2016 but he insists they are still 'best mates'.

Admitting his bond with his second wife is'unusual', he told The Mirror: 'Danielle and I are best mates, we still speak three times a day, we text all the time.'

Enjoying the sunshine: Danielle's teen daughter Ella, who she shares with former footballer lover Adam Willis, was also present

Squad: The day out appeared to be going well as Gary shared laughs with his ex and her children

He added: 'When she comes to London she stays with me, and when I go to LA I see her.'

Gary was first married Michelle Cockayne in 1986, with whom he has four sons – George, 27, Harry, 25, Tobias, 23 and Angus, 22.

They split after a 20-year marriage and three years later, in 2009, Gary married former lingerie model Danielle, who is 19 years his junior.

Funny: Gary was seen sharing a joke with Ella

Still pals: This comes after Gary revealed that he still speaks to ex wife Danielle three times a day. The couple married in 2009 and split in 2016 (pictured together in 2009)

Different: Admitting it's 'unusual', Gary told The Mirror: 'Danielle and I are best mates, we still speak three times a day'

The Match Of The Day presenter claimed Danielle wanted children, despite agreeing with him not to, and their marriage ended in 2016.

Danielle has a teenage daughter from an earlier relationship but was said to be ‘desperate’ to have more children.

Gary claimed she did not wt to pressure him into having a baby as he was getting older.

Speaking to the Times Magazine, the former England football captain said: ‘Obviously I would have done, but she said, “It’s not fair on you”. Then I said, “Well, I’d feel terrible if I stop you doing it”.’

But Gary, who lives alone, revealed in the interview that he remains in close contact with Danielle – who now lives in Los Angeles and has a young daughter with her partner Nate Greenwald.

He said that although she lives in the US and has a new boyfriend, the pair chat regularly, echoing what he told The Mirror.

Close: Danielle and Gary have remained good friends since divorcing in 2016, despite the model relocating to Los Angeles (pictured in 2013)

Gary, who grew up in Leicester, has been out to visit Danielle and has even met Nate – and given his seal of approval.

But while Danielle has moved on, Gary insisted that he is still enjoying single life and going out with friends.

At the time of her pregnancy announcement in March 2017, Gary had been one of the first to congratulate Danielle, with sources claiming he was 'thrilled' for his former flame and Nate.

Gary also talked social media with The Mirror, and said he never thought he would become a political voice.

‘If you’d said to me 10 years ago I’d be some kind of semi-political voice, I would have said not a chance,’ he said.

He also mentioned the trolling on Twitter that he this month pledged not to publicise the social media abuse he receives - in an effort to stamp it out, and said: ‘You can get embroiled in all sorts of nastiness, but I love it more than I loathe it.'

The presenter has topped the BBC list of its highest earners for a second year, pocketing around £1.75million. BBC director general Lord Tony Hall claimed Lineker provided value for money.
description: Gary Lineker, 58, and Danielle Bux, 40, looked very much the friendly exes as they reunited in Los Angeles on Friday.
